about_the_game:
Four-in-One Tabletop Games: Chess, Ludo, Landlord (Dou Di Zhu), and Chinese Chess.
Landlord and Chinese Chess support online multiplayer and avartar. Chinese Chess supports MR.

Step into a relaxing and joyful game hall, pick up the game pieces, and traverse multiple exciting parallel worlds for a tabletop game party!

Snuggle with the orange cat on the sofa and immerse yourself in the pixel-style arena in a battle of chess, or embark on a camping adventure, having an exhilarating time playing ludo with animal friends. If you prefer, gather around a round table in the style of China chic with your friends and fight against the landlord using cards, or challenge a wise opponent in the serene Lake Heart Pavilion, enjoying the delights of Chinese Chess...Multiple games, scenes and levels await your challenge!

— Unique Features: —

· Four-in-One popular tabletop games: Chess, Ludo, Landlord (Dou Di Zhu), Chinese Chess.
· Landlord and Chinese Chess support online multiplayer and avartar. Chinese Chess supports MR.
· From beginners to masters, choose from various difficulty levels. Matched with beginner's tutorials to make your experience enjoyable.
· Diverse game scenes and gameplay, comfortable UI interactions, providing an unparalleled virtual reality experience.
